outline:
1. to be or become king or queen, reign
    1. (Qal) to be or become king or queen, reign
    2. (Hiphil) to make one king or queen, cause to reign
    3. (Hophal) to be made king or queen
  2. to counsel, advise
    1. (Niphal) to consider
kjv_def: consult, [idiom] indeed, be (make, set a, set up) king, be (make) queen, (begin to, make to) reign(-ing), rule, [idiom] surely.
strongs_def: to reign; inceptively, to ascend the throne; causatively, to induct into royalty; hence (by implication) to take counsel
